snippet.title: Lighting effects in my Dwarven RPG! | cave devlog #2
snippet.description:
The gamedev journey continues! In this devlog, I share with you some progress on the inventory system as well as some visual changes. Working with Godot becomes more and more straight-forward as I advance my skills.

👉 Join my Discord now! https://discord.gg/sJjsksEwDq

⌚ Timestamps

0:00 Intro
0:50 The problem
1:20 Trello overview
2:23 Implement lighting (wrong way)
3:38 Implement lighting (the fix)
4:16 Add furnace lighting
5:00 Godot is broken!
6:25 Inventory systems
7:22 Resource-based inventory
8:24 Exploring the new UI
9:25 Newest gameplay
10:14 Outro

🎮 play cave now for FREE: https://bitbrain.itch.io/cave
🐤 follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/bitbrain_
📝 my blog: https://bitbrain.github.io

 #gamedev #devlog #godot #pixelart #gamedevelopment #cave #gamedevlog #bitbrain 

Music Credits

🎧 'Yoghurt' and 'Vue' by xyce https://xyce.bandcamp.com
🎧 'Blue Boi' and other tracks by LAKEY INSPIRED https://soundcloud.com/lakeyinspired/blue-boi
🎧 'MAZE' by Density & Time https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HTT9l4xtWrA
🎧 'Power Up' by Jeremy Blake https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mrgVpZhjOWk
🎧 'DELETE' by KLOUD https://wearekloud.bandcamp.com/
